description: User melissa.rodriguez@company.com created an inbox forwarding rule 'Auto Forward Important' that automatically forwards all incoming emails containing keywords 'invoice', 'payment', 'contract', or 'confidential' to external email address attacker-collection@suspicious-domain.ru. The rule was created at 2024-11-27 08:15:42 UTC via Exchange Online PowerShell, which is unusual for this user who typically accesses Exchange via Outlook Web App. This activity pattern matches Business Email Compromise (BEC) tactics where attackers create forwarding rules to exfiltrate sensitive business communications. The external domain suspicious-domain.ru was registered 3 days ago and has no prior business relationship with the organization.
policy_description: Suspicious email forwarding rule to external domain
policy_recommendation: Disable forwarding rule immediately and reset user credentials
mitre_att&ck_technique: T1114.003 - Email Collection: Email Forwarding Rule
